Title: Establishes the New York city housing authority work tax credit program
Summary: Establishes the New York city housing authority work tax credit program; provides qualified employers with tax credits up to $5,000 for a full time position and $2,500 for part time positions when they hire residents of the New York city housing authority.
LawCode: Add §25-d, Lab L; amd §§210-B & 606, Tax L
ActClause: AN ACT to amend the labor law and the tax law, in relation to establishing the New York city housing authority work tax credit program
